assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ikegami Tsushinki Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of broadcast equipment in Japan and internationally. The company's broadcast equipment includes fiber transmission equipment, audio visual products, HDTV system cameras, CCD HDTV box cameras, 8K and 4K products, microwave products, and HDTV monitors. It also offers security equipment comprising security monitors, security IP network cameras, security DVRs, and security cameras; medical equipment, such as medical monitors, medical cameras, and medical video recorders; and inspection equipment, including plane and other inspection products. The company was formerly known as Ikegami Tsushinki Seisakusho and changed its name to Ikegami Tsushinki Co., Ltd. in 1951. Ikegami Tsushinki Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
